name: re-models
description: Various models for the Reflective Platform

scripts.setcontext: re context -r; re context -d base -e re-metamodel
scripts.deploy: npm run setcontext; re tenant -r; re tenant -t
scripts.postdeploy: npm run drop; npm run create; sleep 1; npm run validate; npm run savevalidations; sleep 1; npm run validate; npm run showvalidations
scripts.create: cat build/objects.json | jq '.objects[].type = "application/json"' | re add -j - | jq '.objects | .[].id'
scripts.validate: echo '{ "query": { "match": { "context.extension": "re-metamodel" } } }' | re search -j - | re validate -j - > build/validation-results.json
scripts.savevalidations: cat build/validation-results.json | jq '.objects[].type = "application/json"' | re add -j - | jq '.objects | .[].id'
scripts.showvalidations: npm run showvalidationlist; npm run showvalidationresult
scripts.showvalidationlist: cat build/validation-results.json | jq -c '.objects | .[].registrations[0].validity[0].input | { subjectId: .subject.id, subjectClass: (.subjectClass.id + " (" +.subjectClass.name + ")"), severity: .severity, validations: .validations }'
scripts.showvalidationresult: cat build/validation-results.json | jq '.objects | [ .[].registrations[0].validity[0].input.validations | .[].severity ] | unique | if (. == [ "none" ]) then "=== validation ok ===" else "=== VALIDATION FAILED: " + (. | tostring) + " ==="end'

author: Reflective Code <code@reflective.dk>
